website_summaries.verdict: A great pick for newbies, this extractor keeps things cool but has enough power to handle chunks of pineapple – with the rind on.
pros: Cold spin features ensure little temperature increase, which protects enzymes and nutrient absorption
Stainless steel disc and mesh filter operation
Dual speed controls (1300 rpm for denser items and 650 rpm for greens and soft fruit)
Many components are top-shelf safe in dishwasher
cons: Leaves pulp very wet, which is messy and means there's juice left in it that hasn't been extracted

customer_reviews.title: Best. Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Best. Juicer. Everrrrrrrr! Don't hesitate. Been using it every single day since I got it. It's just awesome. One side note, put a plastic bag in the disposal container to cut back on the cleaning time. You're welcome!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a juicer for a while but everyone always said it was a beast to clean and so much work involved. After reading tons of reviews, I finally decided to go with the Breville Cold Fountain and it was well worth the money. So simple to use and clean up is a breeze. Definitely nothing like what I've heard abojt juicers. The trick is to clean the juicer as soon as you're done juicing and to use the included brush on the mesh filter!
customer_reviews.author: Gurtej Grewal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of product waste & it’s still very wet. I could squeeze the juice off of it with my hands. I do not recommend buying this one. I will be buying a slow masticating juicer instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought a used juicer from amazon, warning!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, during first use there was juice bubbling out the sides of the waste container. It also gets jammed up with pulp when juicing a large amount. Had to stop and clean out the upper tray when the waste container wasnt even half full. I did buy a used unit that was listed as “very good”. it looked brand new. Maybe that was my problem, buying a used juicer. Won’t do that again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bell

customer_reviews.title: Too much wet pulp left behind
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of money. I bought this to make green juices, but the amount of juice I get out of it is so ridiculously low, (and I use a whoooole lot of veggies/leafy greens) it costs me a fortune to juice the tons of veggies needed to get a good sized glass of juice. Plus the pulp is so wet, that when I squeeze it by hand through a sieve, it will get me the double amount of juice, but how crazy is that, squeezing it by hand?! This really was a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY FROM ANGEL SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: Juicer is not what it is lead to believe. It did not juice as it stated it would. DO NOT BUY FROM ANGEL SELLER, SHE WILL RIP YOU OFF IF YOU RETURN THE PRODUCT! THIS LOW LIFE WILL NOT EVEN RESPOND TO YOUR MESSAGES!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is awesome. I juice in one go - 2 stalks ...
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is awesome. I juice in one go - 2 stalks of celery, 2 beets, 3 large handfuls of spinach (stacked and wrapped into a couple of leaves), 1 inch piece of ginger, and 3 large carrots. It yields 600-800 ml. Clean up is really easy if you do it right away. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: My 5th Breville and the worst.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 7 juicers including 5 Breville ones in my travels in the last 5 years. My last top of the line Breville I have at home was great . I got this new redesigned model for another apartment because it had a better looking jug - which it does but otherwise it doesn’t work nearly as well as prior models. This re design has a weak motor and cheaper components and does not expel pulp properly so if you’re making a lot of juice it all gets caked in the centrifuge. I’m hating this model after loving many others. Try to get the one with the bigger motor and smaller jug.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Juice actually ‘fountains’ into the container. Low moisture pulp. Foam is high, usually about 1/2”+, but it will mix in and dissolve or can be strained off. Better for hard veggies than soft (like melons ). This is the best juicer I have used for celery, fennel & ginger. Fast, takes longer to clean than juice and the large opening is a plus. Cleaning is pretty much a breeze. So far carrot juice has not stained the plastic like my last juicer. My only complaint is the plastic parts seem fragile. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this machine
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this machine. This is my third juicer, the first one was a Juiceman Jr. and second was the commercial Champion. I had problems with both of the other juicers, but the Breville out shines them both! I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christy C

customer_reviews.title: Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: i've been juicing celery since i purchased this juicer and i find it extremely difficult to clean. for some reason the celery juice started to have this buildup that clings to the plastic and is impossible to wash off. the spout is starting to have really bad buildup that's impossible to clean. i've ran it through the dish washer a couple of times already and still came out looking the same. and i feel like the blades have gotten less sharp and effective. this juicer gets the job done fast, but the pulp is still left pretty moist, but i don't have the patience for masticating juicer so... it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: alice c

customer_reviews.title: Long time Breville Juicer owner, not happy with this new model!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a Breville JE98XL that we had for many years. This new model does a terrible job extracting juice and leaves a ridiculously wet pulp which is a total waste of juice... Our JE98XL would kick out very dry pulp, especially when the extractor was brand new. This one does a horrible job. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Oceas

customer_reviews.title: Nice with good features
customer_reviews.text: Bought a warehouse return and saved a bundle. Small piece of plastic broken off. I snipped corner, sanded it smooth and it is no longer noticeable. Wife saw juicer in expensive store. Bought it here Warehouse for 1/3 of that store's price. Powerful motor but pulp is still wetter than I was expecting. Would recommend, though. Easy to use and juice is good. Just did a pineapple and it was awesome! Pulp went into freezer with sugar and some juice for sorbet. Double hit!
customer_reviews.author: boffman4

customer_reviews.title: Not perform as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying juicer. On this specific product, I found out that the grinding is not durable, when i first tried to make juice out of couple apples, very little juice came out and a lot not well grinded apple came out the other side. Did I do something wrong? Anyways this was my first impression on this product. I will confirm my rating after my second use in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: A.J

customer_reviews.title: It's a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It's a horrible leaking mess, I have sticky juice all over my kitchen, and almost none in the pitcher because if the juice doesn't leak all over the place, then it's in the debris bin in the back. Almost none of the juice comes out of the spout 90% of it ends up in the pulp bin. I had to use a separate strainer to not waste all of the juice. I've used this machine twice and I'm done I'm sending it back today.
customer_reviews.author: sarah shore

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Nowadays I never expect too much out of anything since so much is junk. This is so much better than I hoped. I love it!! It handles beets, celery and carrots like they are nothing but a wisp. I have an expensive masticating juicer that requires a lot of time for veggie prep and cleaning. This Breville may not get the greens quite as dry but the time saved is amazing.I can't say enough good about this product. Easy to use and clean and makes juice so quickly. Very, very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Glassingal

customer_reviews.title: Wet pulp, wasted time, wasted money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer in May of ‘17 and have never been extremely happy with it. Since the beginning, I’ve had to run the pulp through numerous times as it comes out very wet, typically getting an extra cup of juice when doing so. I’m writing this review because the pulp reserve now fills with actual juice and *extremely* wet pulp. I’ve lived with it because I know you get what you pay for, but this has become absurd. Don’t waste your money or your time. Invest in something else.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Best health purchase we've made
customer_reviews.text: We love the ease of use and ease of cleaning. I'm pretty lazy in the kitchen so the ability to quickly disassemble and rinse this juicer is easy even when I have a tight morning. Handles celery, kale, apples, ginger, etc like a champ. The juice comes out without needing to be refrigerated or poured over ice like other juicers I have used that heat up the juice a lot.
customer_reviews.author: CTP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but ongoing costs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this juicer. I’ve had it for 5 months and I’m so glad I bought it. One thing though, if you plan on using it often, you’ll need to replace the filter every few months ($35). Every week I juice enough to last for the week and it includes kale, spinach, apples, celery, carrots, lemons. After the first 3 months, I started getting about half to 3/4 the amount of juice I first got. When I realized what the issue was, I replaced the part and it’s brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bethune

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer four months ago and I have been using it only twice a week. I have to put a massive amount of vegetables to get only a small amount of juice. It has increasingly produced more wet pulp going in the food waste than in the juice recipient. Now 90 percent of the veggies and fruit turn into a wet, heavy pulp. This is a complete waste of food and waste of money. I am very disappointed with this ineffective juicer and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PMV3005

customer_reviews.title: BEST JUICER EVER
customer_reviews.text: If this broke tomorrow I would immediately buy a new one. Love it so so much. Best juicer!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: This machine is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, fast, not as huge as it looks in photos so will fit on your counter. I love carrot juice. JAMBA JUICE price for 18oz carrot juice is about $8. Just bought 5 pound bags of organic carrots for $3 each. Makes a quart of juice under 5 minutes. Cleaned and dried machine under 5 min. Bought Breville compostable bags to line the machine's bin, so no bin cleaning required.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen K. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Untitled
customer_reviews.text: So far I like. I juice fruits and vegetables for us, usually 2-3 times a week. After reading a hint to put plastic bag in pulp container cut cut clean by a third or more. I hand wash with hot soapy water. Hope I get years use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E Vallor

customer_reviews.title: Machine functions fine, but some design flaw allows the pulp to ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine functions fine, but some design flaw allows the pulp to be ejected when it's still wet. There is a decent percentage of overall liquid left in it. Makes me sad :(
customer_reviews.author: joshua cox

customer_reviews.title: Wet pulp
customer_reviews.text: I've had this juicer for over a year now and ultimately it is not a good buy in my opinion because of the wet pulp it produces. There is more juice in the pulp than in the actual juice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Does not extracting enough juice
customer_reviews.text: I've been juice pineapples, grapefruits and apples for about a month in my daughters Koios Juicer. I decided to get my own but I liked the info on the Breville Juice Fountain. The cleanup was to easy, the assembly was to easy, but the extraction of the juice and leaving mushy pulp was not acceptable. I will be returning and purchasing another juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Willie S.

customer_reviews.title: Moderate Juicer for the price.....
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works great for carrots,apples and oranges it leaves a dry pulp in the pulp bin.If you are planning to make celery juice this may not be the right juicer for you.Too much wet pulp in the pulp bin that I have to strain with the strainer everytime I juice celery.it juices carrots in seconds and leaves pulp in carrot juice. I have to strain and give it to my kids as they dont like pulp in their juices.Overall it's a moderate juicer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shaan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one month
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this blender for one month and it started breaking down but still working now had for one month and a half and now don’t work at all very disappointed now that Amazon is not excepting calls I can’t get another one to replace it messing with my business for sure
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As with most centrifugal juicers, there are some slices of fruits and vegetables that slip between the chute and the blade. But I always re-juice my pulp anyway so I catches it the second time around. This juicer is easy to use and clean. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Previous Breville was better
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Breville juicer. The first one I owned was very similar but not the cold press. My first Breville was easier to clean and produced more juice. The angle on this one seems to be off a little as a lot of juice goes into the refuse. Also the pulp seems to be much more moist than on my previous Breville. I think Breville is a great brand but I would rather the juice fountain elite I had purchased previously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This really doesn't meet our expectations. It juices quickly which is a positive but after that there are a few cons. It seems to leek out the back in a spray form and gets all over our kitchen counters. Just a mess every time we use it. It doesn't seem to get all the juice as the veggies and fruit pulp are quite wet which they shouldn't be if the juicer did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brahs

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer so far. It's easy and straightforward to use and not too terrible to clean, either. That's the biggest bonus. It makes delicious, smooth juice without too much pulp (almost none)! I feel like I got my money's worth in value for this. Other juicers are way pricier and I somehow doubt they're all that much better. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey M

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean, I use it every morning.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer so I really don't have a lot to compare to. I purchased this for the good reviews about how easy it is to clean. I knew if something was to much work I would not have the time for that and I would not use it. This is perfect, I use it every morning before work, it's quick and really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Juice Not Worth The Squueze
customer_reviews.text: I liked my first Breville so much that I bought a second. After a month or so of daily use, what I noticed was that the product became less effective. A lot of juice was ending up in the waste receptacle and wasting the veggies I was juicing. I could literally make almost a full glass of juice out of what was ending up a refuse. Long term I DO NOT recommend this product as soon after you throw out the box and have forgotten to apply for the warranty, you’ll have to replace it. Too bad, I own other Breville products and both juicers have let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for making juices but not orange juice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine initially to make orange juice as after reading many of the reviews it said that it was great for that. But I will be using to make other juices other than orange juice as I really don't like the way the orange juice comes out. I tried it many times in both the low and high mode but the juice comes out with too much foam and the flavor is not the same as when you make the orange juice in other machines.
customer_reviews.author: Alenna

customer_reviews.title: Bad juicers
customer_reviews.text: Less then Two months motor doesn’t want to work any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use a plastic bag inside the pulp catcher so cleanup is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I read on some reviews that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I read on some reviews that it leaves big chunks of fruit/vegetables that it doesn't blend all of it. But I figured out that once it starts getting to full of the shreds it starts kinda backing up therefor not letting the blades do their work. But I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Machine never turned on.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for partnerto use at his office. He was so excited to show his co-workers but the appliance never worked. Both settings low and high do not work. Contacted the company andhave them plenty of time to respond. We were ignored. I have one at home but I will never again spend a dollar on Breville products.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer!! Does not leak as long as you follow the directions and juice properly. It’s powerful and quiet. It is sorta a pain to clean due to all the parts. Some are dish washer safe and others aren’t. Should just make them all dishwasher safe and make while cleaning process a no brainer. But otherwise it’s a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts to clean, wet pulp after so lots of waste, doesn’t do leafy veggies well Not bad but not great either
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duong

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and reliable
customer_reviews.text: We 'juice' several times a day for health and weight loss. This machine is a workhorse!
customer_reviews.author: WFG WATERFALL GLEN SOAP COMPANY, LLC. SHARE THE GOODNESS

customer_reviews.title: It is impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had an old, cheap juicer that I replaced with this one and I'm so sad I did. After just a few months of use, it is stained and looks awful. It has this ridge where food gets stuck and I can't get it clean. The stains will not come off. This is a huge waste of money and I'm sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover3

customer_reviews.title: Not good for leafy greens but great for large produce.
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for cutting down prep time and juicing large hard fruits and veggies. This is not good for leafy greens, just shoots it into the waste bin with VERY LITTLE juice. After a few uses the top doesn’t lock as well and juices are leaking out the side. It also shoots juice straight up the top when you throw small items in, such as strawberries. I’ve owned two completely difference juicers and both have many flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amara W.

customer_reviews.title: Yes your fruit and vegetables won't be bone dry afterward, but you get plenty of juice.
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product! Yes your fruit and vegetables won't be bone dry afterward, but you get plenty of juice. Try different speeds for different foods to see which gives the most juice for example carrots do best on slow, apples do best on fast. Just trouble shoot for yourself. Absolutely no pulp. Its amazing what our Creator has made in fruits and vegetables and how this machine allows you to consume most of the nutritional value without the bulk. I bought a used one and it looked like it hadn't been used at all. I love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like this but I juice a lot of veggies and fruit and I have to put the pulp back through several times to get all the juice out
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. Especially for those that are wanting to chose the ‘juicing lifestyle’. I would say that most people who chose to go juicing stop after a while because it is tough to find a tasty recipe and that the juicer they bought is tough to clean. This unit is simple to clean and put back together. I usually clean mine while my juice is chilling in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful juicer, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a standard centrifugal juicer (Acme and Olympic). It juces well - but uses up lots more produce for the same amount of juice.. It's much easier to clean. And, using a plastic produce bag lining the catcher makes cleaning out the remains really efficient. I use kale, apple, carrots, broccoli, cucumber for my super drink.
customer_reviews.author: Murrieta Maturity

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the juicer. It is super easy to clean and make all the green juice. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Ok but leaves a lot of pulp, not great for leafy greens
customer_reviews.text: I have an Omega masticating juicer which I've been using for a few years. I bought the Breville for my mother for when I come home to visit I'd make juices. This juicer works well enough. Easy to use, easy to clean. But it leaves alot of pulp, which in comparison to my Omega masticating juicer seems like a waste. It does reasonably well with carrots, apples (granny smith), ginger, celery. But not as well leafy greens. I like green juices and a masticating juicer is simply superior if you want to juice things like spinach and kale. Good enough juicer, I guess. But I prefer my Omega.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s good for beginners which I am. I will eventually upgrade to a slow masticating juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new juicer, did notice it leaks a bit along the waste collection area but otherwise works perfectly! Nothing a paper towel can't catch! Juice is so good and the pitcher is so big! I can make twice the juice in half the time! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cash

customer_reviews.title: This is an easy to use juicer for first time juicers
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use juicer for first time juicers. I don't have anything else to compare it to but I love it! It is easy to clean and not a hassle to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kaori Umekita

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the pieces was a little intimidating at first, but once you get it down, it’s easy. I love this juicer so much that we gifted one to our friends. We all love how this juicer doesn’t make the juice hot or warm even. The pitcher with the lid is also a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked, now makes a mess everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom to start juicing. She enjoyed it until the 2 pieces making the juice cover cracked on both sides leading to the pulp container. Now every time she juices, it makes a mess with the juice seeping through the seams. How can I fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of juice but good quality materials
customer_reviews.text: While this juicer is made from high quality materials - it definitely wastes a significant amount of juice in the pulp. I wish I had been more patient with my decision, having bought other centrifugal juicers in the past. I will likely be returning this product for a masticating juicer instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Dias

customer_reviews.title: wonderful juicer!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is one powerful juicer. It can handle any fruit and the toughest vegetables, but you must follow the directions for use and care completely. clean up and assembly is easy. I love the high capacity Pulp Bin Container and the jug seals properly and keeps juice fresh. I love it!! it's worth every penny. It also comes with some recipe ideas with the booklet. My kids love it. juice i feel good knowing they are getting their fruits and veggies and are drinking fresh real juice
customer_reviews.author: ebyydwn

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't heat up the juice like previous juicers that I have used
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing everyday. It doesn't heat up the juice like previous juicers that I have used. Also the pulp comes out dryer. Excellent product, works like a charm! I love that you can throw an entire Apple and most fruit in there without having to cut it up.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce E. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: Got this juicer because sometimes I just crave a nice healthy juice. Plus my husband doesn’t eat a lot of vegetables so I can get him to drink his vitamins and minerals he may be deficient of.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: 4 months having this juicer it stopped working! I troubleshot, did everything right and NOTHING, ZERO, NADA. Amazon gave me a full refund. I then ordered a smaller Breville, yea plugged it in and guess what? NOTHING! Had to return that one too, not even used one time. What the heck is wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Testa

customer_reviews.title: Badly made US product manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.text: The product is made poorly, in China, it stopped working after 1 month. This is not the Breville that I am used to (made originally in the United States).
customer_reviews.author: Andreea Lazar

customer_reviews.title: More fun than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as expected; I'm surprised how much fun it is to watch the veggies get pulverized.
customer_reviews.author: MechKeyLover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect juicer
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 3 months now and I have been doing celery juice almost every morning. It works perfect! Easy to assemble and clean after each use.
customer_reviews.author: breklyn froerer

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best juicers I have had. It works very well. I like how tall the pitcher is so you can make bigger batches for cleansings. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C_trureview

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many juicers over a few decades. This is the absolute best. This brand is good over all. I have other appliances from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Home run Juice is a Breeze to operate and Clean.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and a breeze to clean. I am new to juicing and I struck gold with this machine. It is so easy to operate and clean. Set up and juicing within the time it took to prepare the veggies and fruit. Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for juicer.
customer_reviews.author: D. F. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm juicing everyday is that easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: An improved model
customer_reviews.text: This is the second breville juicer I've used and it is a marked improvement over earlier models. The seals work very well to keep juicing mess contained within the machine. Great juicer. Makes the process so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: gail j

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clog
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor device. The feed tube is large, but the device cannot handle a full apple without clogging at the exit tube. The pulp is very wet - so the actual juice extracted is very poor in volume. Also, very foamy. We have an older Acme Supreme Juicerator that produces beautiful juice with dry pulp residue. But it has a small feed tube! So we bought this Breville to increase our volume. No such thing! All in all, a very poor unit that looks good but cannot handle it!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had the old brevile and the seal broke, I had green juice everywhere. Tried an upgrade this time and I love it! The higher capacity is nice when making juice for more than one person at a time. The machine is much quieter than my old juicer. Easy to clean. It is large on the countertop, if you keep both the containers (for pulp and for juice) on the counter with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mpep2016

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using it for almost a year and it’s real good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for almost a year and it’s real good
customer_reviews.author: eyad

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Motor stopped working in less than 2 years, the company only has a 1 year warranty. The only thing i juiced - ever- was celery which is soft, and not very dense. Tt would not have had a big impact on the motor. Company does nothing to help if the motor dies.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Just opened the box and the screw that secures the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and the screw that secures the handle on the lid for the juice receptacle is missing.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivered this to my neighbor. I'm lucky I got it! Please ask the delivery person to pay attention make accurate deliver.
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. I like my juice with pulp. You get more juice and just the right amount of juice. I had a jack lalane juicer. It did the job but I get twice the juice from my breville juicer. The clean up is about the same but the breville includes a brush to clean the basket with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful
customer_reviews.text: This juicer can handle a lot more than any other juicer we've owned. Even does leafy greens well. Even peels the rind right off of watermelon so you don't have to cut it up except to make it fit. Its also very easy to clean with only a few parts that disassemble easily.
customer_reviews.author: G J Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and clean. Make sure to follow setting directions for different veggies and fruit in order to maximize juice output. The juicer itself isn't too large, which is great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean. easy to use, seems very durable. I bought an extra warranty just in case but i feel like i do not need it since it has a 1 year manufacture warranty anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Platinum Team

customer_reviews.title: I liked this juicer until tonight
customer_reviews.text: I liked this juicer until tonight. Juicer was delivered in March and not even a full month later out of no where it stoped working. We use this juicer everyday taking good care of it. The juicer turns on but will shut off by itself saying overload protection before we even begin to juice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting one of these for a while, researched and found this one! Great quality, easy to use and clean, and makes tasty juices
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMomma

customer_reviews.title: this it's great quality, after 10 weeks of use still works ...
customer_reviews.text: not much negative to say about, this it's great quality, after 10 weeks of use still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST juicer I’ve ever bought!! Love, Love, it... I love the fact that you can put a whole apple in the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Distinguished Looks by D'Ann

customer_reviews.title: I juice everything now...
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice since receiving it and it's amazing. Juice comes out without any added heat from processing. Separates pulp from juice with amazing efficiency. Clean up is an absolute breeze. I'm glad we spent the extra money to go with this model.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morse

customer_reviews.title: Has a powerful motor that with juicy results.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer gets the job done! Juice in minutes. Great for juicing fruits, ginger, beats, carrots but the oranges or leafy greens there is a lot of juice that doesn’t get collected. I’m thinking a cold press juicer would be best for leafy greens and super juicy fleshy fruits. I needed to purchase extra cleaning tools to clean out the spout area and one other area hard to reach to clean. Powerful motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice juicer!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it steady for a month now and it works great. Occasionally if the pulp still feels heavy we'll run the pulp thru again. Not sure how long the blade lasts so that is yet TBD. Lost weight on the juice reboot and have been eating healthier since.
customer_reviews.author: CapnKent

customer_reviews.title: its super easy to user and I love the look and shape
customer_reviews.text: the propose of this purchase is health, I am starting a 21 days detox deal, to improve my health, thank you for the super quick delivery, I was expecting it more later! So now I am able to start today!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Juiced Up!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, this juicer does a great job. I have noticed that pulp is usually a little wet as stated in some of the reviews and does throw some smaller chunks into the bin. Overall, these minor items are all acceptable to me because the juice it produces is magnificent.
customer_reviews.author: Doug D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I was nervous this was going to give me problembs. But it's really good and I enjoy using it. I'm on my 9th day of juicing and 51 days left. So for the price I hope it works for many months to come. I get plenty of juice from it and love the big pitcher it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer, but rerun your pulp a couple times to get all the juice out
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer, but a word to other customers. After your initial juicing of your fruits and vegetables after you've turned it off take all of the pulp and run it through again, and even a third time and see how much more juice is left. You will be amazed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Especially hold it's own with harder fruits and vegetables. Great for your juicing needs. Takes a bit of counter space, so keep that in mind if you don't have much.
customer_reviews.author: Burt R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer!
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest to clean juicers I’ve owned! Makes perfect juices, a great product! Money we spent!
customer_reviews.author: Dajisha Pitts

customer_reviews.title: The big opening allows you to drop whole lemons without ...
customer_reviews.text: The big opening allows you to drop whole lemons without the need to peel them off. This is a huge convenience. This juicer is able to extract a bigger amount of juice in shorter amount of time compared to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: eliza_day

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Used for juicing fruit/vegetables; does a good job. Relatively easy to clean. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Don Cremin

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER A YEAR !
customer_reviews.text: MINE STOPPED WORKING AFTER A YEAR . Do not waste money . I’ve seen cheaper ones that last longer that do the same job. It also wastes a lot of product 🤬

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: If you loved you seeing this is a game changer! Love love love! Super efficient & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa

customer_reviews.title: Juicer for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is great! Fast and efficient! Clean up is quick and easy. Only draw back is it takes up counter space in my small kitchen but I made space.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah White

customer_reviews.title: Juices good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it juices, but it could be easier to clean

customer_reviews.title: This machine is awesome. I make fresh ginger shots every day
customer_reviews.text: where has this been all my juicing days? This machine is awesome. I make fresh ginger shots every day, this machine has no problems it more than makes up for the cost of itself than spending $5 a shot.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the Juice Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well-built product that very effectively does the job of juicing. It does take up some counter space but other than that, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Huge container, great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It’s an improved version of the one I had for 3 years. I juice a lot. This machine is excellent, and has a larger container than the newest model
customer_reviews.author: dancingLass

customer_reviews.title: Loud, wasteful, not good with greens, and a beast to clean
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the juicer works. It decimates vegetables in seconds. So for that it is a good product. However, it is LOUD, wastes a lot of juice (At least 2 cups per juicing), doesn’t juice greens (well, if at all), and takes FOREVER to clean. Went back to my $90 Aicok upright masticating juicer.
customer_reviews.author: KtWolf

product_meta.title: Breville BJE430SIL The Juice Fountain Cold
product_meta.description: Get into juicing with this no nonsense dual Speed juice fountain cold. Ideal for first time juicers, this juicer runs on 850 watts and has two Speeds, 13,000RPM or 6,500RPM, for hard and soft ingredients. Fruit is largely composed of water, but its selling point is its nutritional value. How do you extract the juice from fruit, without leaving the nutrients behind? Breville's Nutria Disc and patented juicing system extract more nutrients than other juicers and transfers less than 1.8F of heat to protect enzymes and maximize nutrient absorption of select nutrients. The uniquely designed juicing system features a feed chute that is centered over the shredding disc. This allows for more efficient juicing than systems that introduce ingredients on the side of the shredding disc. The dual Speed, 850 watt motor allows you to juice hard fruits and vegetables like apples and beets on high Speed at 13,000 RPM, while the low Speed (6,500rpm) is optimal for softer fruits and leafy Green vegetables like cantaloupe and spinach. The Juice Fountain Plus cutting disc is so powerful that pineapple can be juiced in large chunks with the rind on. In addition, this juicer features an extra wide 3 inch feeder chute that accommodates large chunks or entire pieces of fruit or vegetables, eliminating the need for chopping vegetables. The BJE430SIL is not only easy to use, but also easy to clean. It is pulp ejecting and comes with a large capacity pulp collector and most parts can be cleaned on the top shelf of the dishwasher.
feature_bullets: Cold Spin Technology allows juice to flow up and through the stainless steel cutting disc surrounded by an Italian Made mesh filter to ensure an insignificant temperature increase
Extra Wide Whole Feed Chute measuring 3 inch to juice Whole fruits and vegetables
Safety Locking Arm stops operation when cover is not locked correctly into place
Jug capacity featuring a 70 ounce seal and store Juice Jug; Stainless steel micro mesh filter basket
2 Speed electronic Control; High speed for denser fruits and harder vegetables at 1300 rpm, and low speed for leafy vegetables and Soft fruit at 6500 rpm
